Package cz.cuni.mff.java.flightplanner.util

Class METARDecoder

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.flightplanner.util.METARDecoder
public class METARDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
The METARProcessor is the class responsible for parsing, modifying and processing the file(s) with METAR entries. This class processes and decodes all the files into the comprehensible language.

      public METARDecoder()

  • Method Details

    • fileDecode

      public int fileDecode​(java.io.File metarToDecode, java.io.PrintStream printer, boolean fileOutput)
      The method which takes the file denoted by metarToDecode and progressively translates its different sections of the METAR.
      Parameters:
      metarToDecode - The fixed METAR file to be decoded.
      printer - The printer used for printing.
      fileOutput - The flag indicating that the output is directed to a file.
      Returns:
      The exit code of the action. Any non-zero code means that an issue has occurred.

    • readInReverseOrder

      private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readInReverseOrder​(java.io.File fileToRead)
      Reads the file and adds each line to the end of the list. After each line of the file is added to the list, it is reversed using Collections.reverse(List) method. The file to be read in reverse order is small enough. Therefore, performance should not be affected. Reverse reading is done due to the fixed structure of the downloaded file.
      Parameters:
      fileToRead - The file to be read.
      Returns:
      The list containing all lines from the file in the reverse order.

    • csvMETARtidy

      private java.lang.String[] csvMETARtidy​(java.lang.String metarEntry)
      Processes the input METAR entry in .csv format and separates the metadata from the actual METAR.
      Parameters:
      metarEntry - a METAR unit and its metadata in .csv format
      Returns:
      The String array of length 2, which contains the metadata on its first position and the METAR itself on the second position, or null if a database issue is detected.

    • metarEntryDecode

      private void metarEntryDecode​(java.lang.String metarEntry, java.io.PrintStream printer, java.lang.String initInfo, boolean tokenPrint)
      Decode a METAR unit specified in the metarEntry. The fixed-structured METAR is divided into tokens. Each token is treated based on the category it belongs to. METAR entry is being decoded using the US/CAN METAR explanation and general METAR explanation websites.
      Parameters:
      metarEntry - The actual METAR unit which will be decoded.
      printer - The printer used for printing.
      initInfo - The String containing initial information to be printed before each decoding.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether each token should be highlighted before its translation.

    • rwyStateGroup

      private static java.lang.String rwyStateGroup​(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String rsgPttrn, boolean tokenPrint)
      Decodes the "runway state group" part of a METAR. This part provides the information about any runway contamination (e.g. snow, water, oil) which may impact the braking action and aircraft safety during landing. The METAR explanation sources are precised in metarEntryDecode(String, PrintStream, String, boolean) method.
      Parameters:
      token - The raw RSG description.
      rsgPttrn - The regex to ensure that the token is classified correctly.
      tokenPrint - The flag indicating whether to highlight the separation between different sections.
      Returns:
      The decoded result String based on the information in the raw RSG token.

    • getRSGRwyContamination

      private static java.lang.String getRSGRwyContamination​(char arg)
      The method used for rwyStateGroup(String, String, boolean). This method decodes a part of the RSG descriptor based on the descriptor explanation at the METAR explanation websites mentioned in metarEntryDecode(String, PrintStream, String, boolean) method documentation.
      Parameters:
      arg - The character whose meaning is searched for.
      Returns:
      The meaning of the arg character.

    • getRSGContaminationExtent

      private static java.lang.String getRSGContaminationExtent​(char arg)
      The method used for rwyStateGroup(String, String, boolean). This method decodes a part of the RSG descriptor based on the descriptor explanation at the METAR explanation websites mentioned in metarEntryDecode(String, PrintStream, String, boolean) method documentation.
      Parameters:
      arg - The character whose meaning is searched for.
      Returns:
      The meaning of the arg character.

    • getRSGContaminationDepth

      private static java.lang.String getRSGContaminationDepth​(java.lang.String arg)
      The method used for rwyStateGroup(String, String, boolean). This method decodes a part of the RSG descriptor based on the descriptor explanation at the METAR explanation websites mentioned in metarEntryDecode(String, PrintStream, String, boolean) method documentation.
      Parameters:
      arg - The String whose meaning is searched for.
      Returns:
      The meaning of the arg String.

    • getRSGRwyModificator

      private static java.lang.String getRSGRwyModificator​(java.lang.String rwy)
      The method used for rwyStateGroup(String, String, boolean). This method decodes a part of the RSG descriptor based on the descriptor explanation at the METAR explanation websites mentioned in metarEntryDecode(String, PrintStream, String, boolean) method documentation.
      Parameters:
      rwy - The String runway representation whose meaning is searched for.
      Returns:
      The meaning of the arg parameter.

    • getRSGBrakingAction

      private static java.lang.String getRSGBrakingAction​(java.lang.String arg)
      The method used for rwyStateGroup(String, String, boolean). This method decodes a part of the RSG descriptor based on the descriptor explanation at the METAR explanation websites mentioned in metarEntryDecode(String, PrintStream, String, boolean) method documentation.
      Parameters:
      arg - The String whose meaning is searched for.
      Returns:
      The meaning of the arg parameter.

    • seaLvlPressure

      private static java.lang.String seaLvlPressure​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method takes token parameter which represents the sea-level pressure (SLP) and translates it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      token - The SLP to be translated.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      The information about sea-level pressure.

    • windshearWarning

      private static java.lang.String windshearWarning​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method explains the warning of possible wind-shear existence in the vicinity of the airport.
      Parameters:
      token - Wind-shear token to be translated.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      Wind shear warning explanation.

    • pressure

      private static java.lang.String pressure​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method takes token parameter which represents the pressure information and translates it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      token - Encoded pressure information to be translated
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      The information about pressure using correct units.

      private static java.lang.String verticalVisibility​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)

      Parameters:
      token - The vertical visibility representation to be translated.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      The information about vertical visibility using correct units.

    • cloudLayer

      private static java.lang.String cloudLayer​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method takes token the cloud type and height representation and translates it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      token - The clound representation to be translated.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      The cloud information explanation.

    • temperature

      private static java.lang.String temperature​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method takes token parameter which represents the temperature encoding and translates it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      token - The temperature to be translated.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      Decoded temperature.

    • weatherPhenomena

      private static java.lang.String weatherPhenomena​(java.lang.String token, boolean recentWeather, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method takes token parameter which represents the weather phenomenon abbreviation and translates it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      token - The weather phenomenon token to be decoded.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      recentWeather - Indicates whether the token represents the "Recent weather" part of a METAR.
      Returns:
      The wind variation explanation.

    • rvrVisibility

      private static java.lang.String rvrVisibility​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method translates the visibility measured at runway level using while recognizing the different formats and modifiers (Europe/US, Canada) for specified airport.
      Parameters:
      token - The runway visibility string to be translated
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      The translation of at-runway level visibility information.

    • visibility

      private static java.lang.String visibility​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      The visibility translator which looks at the visibility unit and returns correct value.
      Parameters:
      token - The visibility string to be translated.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      The information about visibility using correct units.

    • windDirSpd

      private static java.lang.String windDirSpd​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method takes token parameter and the regular expression this parameter matches and explains the numbers in the appropriate way.
      Parameters:
      token - The String to translate. It has to match provided pattern expression.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      token with added explanation.

    • windVariation

      private static java.lang.String windVariation​(java.lang.String token, boolean tokenPrint)
      This method takes token parameter which represents the wind variation and translates it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      token - The String to be translated.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates whether the token should be highlighted before its translation.
      Returns:
      String which explains the wind variation.

    • checkAndSetMetarDict

      private static int checkAndSetMetarDict()
      Checks whether the dictionary with METAR terminology already exists. If it does not, then reads the .txt file containing the dictionary with specified terminology and creates Map<String,String> metarDict map.
      Returns:
      The exit code of the action. Any non-zero code means that an issue has occurred.
      See Also:
      metarDict

    • initTokenDecoder

      private static java.lang.String initTokenDecoder​(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String pattern, boolean tokenPrint)
      Method which initializes a token decoding session. It verifies that the token matches the pattern and then prepares the first part of the resulting token translation.
      Parameters:
      token - A token: part of the METAR.
      pattern - The pattern the token has to match.
      tokenPrint - The flag which indicates the token highlighting.
      Returns:
      The "init" value for each token. It is either an empty string or a highlighted token.
